definition: to walk/to go/to run/to move (of vehicle)/to visit/to leave/to go away/to die (euph.)/from/through/away (in compound verbs, such as 撤走[che4 zou3])/to change (shape, form, meaning)

sentences.english: We expect yield curves to steepen significantly over the medium term.
sentences.chinese: 我們預計收益率曲線將在中期顯著變陡。

sentences.english: The mountain was high and steep, and the snow knee-deep. It was really dangerous to climb.
sentences.chinese: 山又高又陡，而且雪深沒膝，爬上去好險呀。

sentences.english: The land falls off here towards the river.
sentences.chinese: 這裏的地勢朝河的方向陡降下去。

sentences.english: The short cut ia steep and more difficult to climb. Only the brave few took the path.
sentences.chinese: 那條捷徑很陡，十分難爬，只有少數勇敢者走這條路。

sentences.english: The Dachigan structural zone is one of the steep structural zones in Eastern Sichuan Basin.
sentences.chinese: 大池乾井構造帶是川東高陡構造帶之一。

sentences.english: The road he took had a deep incline.
sentences.chinese: 他走的那條路有一個很陡的斜坡。

sentences.english: The cliff dropped away at his feet.
sentences.chinese: 懸崖在他腳下陡降下去。

sentences.english: However, to the top of the cliff road more difficult to climb, because it is steeper, more risks.
sentences.chinese: 但是，往崖頂的路更難爬，因爲它更陡，更險。

sentences.english: The last part of the ascent is very steep.
There was a steep climb on the road out of town.
sentences.chinese: 市外公路上有一處很陡的上坡路。

sentences.english: It is difficult to get a footing on the steep roof.
sentences.chinese: 要在那很陡的屋頂上找到立腳處很困難。

sentences.english: The mountain road began to twist up, steeper and steeper.
sentences.chinese: 山路開始向上曲折盤旋，越來越陡。

sentences.english: Then the grass turned to bushes and the hillside became steeper.
sentences.chinese: 接着，野草變成了矮樹叢，山坡也變陡了。

sentences.english: The Heavenly Ladder is rather steep and precipitous. Please don't run, jump, and fight playfully during the climbing.
sentences.chinese: 上天梯較爲險陡，請不要在攀登的過程中跑跳打逗。

sentences.english: The path was very steep and narrow suspending over formidable abyss.
sentences.chinese: 路窄坡陡，兩邊是萬丈深淵。

sentences.english: The self-steepening effect and the third order dispersion affect the transmission characteristics little.
sentences.chinese: 而自陡效應，三階色散對傳輸特性影響不大。

definition: uphill/upslope/to move upwards/to climb a slope
topography of a mountain/features of a mountain
